Class.name: %Library.zip
Class.Description:
Class to create and extract zip
https://pkware.cachefly.net/webdocs/casestudies/APPNOTE.TXT
https://www.zlib.net/manual.htm
win 32 bit date time format https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/9kkf9tah.aspx
source https://github.com/nlzv/isc_zip

example how to zip set zip=##class(%zip).%New() set zip.SourceDir="/mnt/tmp/zip/testpack/" set zip.files(1)="test1.txt" set zip.files(2)="test2.txt" set zip.packfile="/mnt/tmp/zip/testpack/test.zip" do zip.pack() example how to unzip do zip=##class(%zip).open("/mnt/tmp/zip/testunpack/test.zip") set zip.TargetDir="/mnt/tmp/zip/testunpack/" do zip.unpack() limitations
on unicode cache kernel only 8bits file names (i.e. in latin)

Property.name: files
Property.Description: files array in LFH (list file header)

Property.name: idxlfhfiles
Property.Description: file index index map relative file path to LDH index

Property.name: fcomments
Property.Description: file comments array, LFH index

Property.name: LFHo
Property.Description: offsets of LFHs

Property.name: LFHbin
Property.Description: binary images of LFHs

Property.name: CDRo
Property.Description: CDR (common directory name) s offsets

Property.name: CDRbin
Property.Description: CDRs binary images

Property.name: DDbin
Property.Description: data descriptor

Property.name: packfile
Property.Description: the name of zip/pack file

Property.name: lfhlen
Property.Description: length static part of list file header

Property.name: lfhoffset
Property.Description: auxilary var to track location of LFH in packfile

Property.name: ZipComment
Property.Description: zip comment

Property.name: SourceDir
Property.Description: source directory add file from this directory it becomes current during pack()

Property.name: TargetDir
Property.Description: directory to unpack files

Property.name: TargetSubDirs
Property.Description: check wether Target sub directory is created

Property.name: use
Property.Description:
use = 0 existed archive, unpack
use = 1 create archive, pack, add file to arhive

Property.name: forcezip64
Property.Description:
1 use zip64 extra extension even file size less than 2**32-1
0 use zip64 extra extension if file size more than 2**32-1

Property.name: ZE
Property.Description: $ZERROR saved

Property.name: endian
Property.Description: 0 little endian platform 1 big endian platform

Property.name: time
Property.Description: time of the last pack/unpack function

Property.name: rsize
Property.Description:
size during pack/unpack functions
in future it will be rsize

Property.name: wsize
Property.Description:
writing size during pack/unpack functions
not yet calculated

Method.name: open
Method.Description:
open existed zip archive
return %zip object
files property is populated by relative filenames in archive

Method.name: closepack
Method.Description: close pack file, i.e. create common directories records
Method.Implementation:
#; write CDRs #;B ; start add CDRs set cdroffset=..lfhoffset set oeocdr=cdroffset set zip64=0 set len=0 set i="" for { set i=$order(..LFHbin(i),1,binlfh) quit:i="" do ..mkCDRfromLFH(.bincdr,binlfh,..LFHo(i),,,,.zip64) #;B ; mkdCDRfromLFH done if zip64=1 { set ..zip64=1 } set len=len+$L(bincdr) W bincdr }
#; write end of CDR #;B ; write end of CDR set n=$order(..files(""),-1) if ..zip64=1 { do ..mkEOCDR64(.bineocdr64,cdroffset,len,n) W bineocdr64 do ..mkEOCDL64(.bineocdl64,cdroffset+len) W bineocdl64 do ..mkEOCDR(.bineocdr,cdroffset#4294967296,len#4294967296,n) #;do ..mkEOCDR(.bineocdr,4294967295,4294967295,n) #;do ..mkEOCDR(.bineocdr,0,0,n) W bineocdr #;B ; eocdr64 } else { do ..mkEOCDR(.bineocdr,cdroffset,len,n) W bineocdr }

Method.name: pack
Method.Description:
create zip archive with list of files in files property
SourceDir relative
packfile argument override packfile property
Method.Implementation: set ..time=$zh set ..rsize=0 set ..zip64=0 if packfile="" { set packfile=..packfile } else { set ..packfile=packfile } try { close packfile } catch {} open packfile:("NWUK\RAW\") use packfile set dir=$SYSTEM.Process.CurrentDirectory(..SourceDir) set ..lfhoffset=0 set i="" for { set i=$order(..files(i),1,file) quit:i="" do ..packbyid(i) } use packfile:..lfhoffset do ..closepack() close packfile do $SYSTEM.Process.CurrentDirectory(dir) set ..time=$zh-..time

Method.name: packbyid
Method.Implementation: #;B ; start pack add file by id set file=..files(id) set packfile=..packfile set gzipminhdrlen=..gzipminhdrlen set lfhoffset=..lfhoffset use packfile:lfhoffset set size=##class(%File).GetFileSize(file) set ..rsize=..rsize+size set hlocalmoddattime=$zu(140,2,file,0) set tsodbc=$zdt(hlocalmoddattime,3) set date=..dosDateYMDtoBin($E(tsodbc,1,4),$E(tsodbc,6,7),$E(tsodbc,9,10)) set time=..dosTimeHMStoBin($E(tsodbc,12,13),$E(tsodbc,15,16),$E(tsodbc,18,19)) set maxsize=2**32-1 if size>maxsize || ..forcezip64 { set zip64=1 } else { set zip64=0 } #; version 2.0 low order byte set version=$C(20,0) set flag=$C(0,0) #; method deflate set method=$C(8,0) #;B ; before make lfh if zip64=1 { set extraZip64=$C(1,0)_$ZWC(16)_$ZQC(size)_$ZQC(0) #if 0 #; data descriptor set flag=$ZWC(8) #; datadesc set datadesc=$C(0,0,0,0)_$ZQC(zipsize)_$ZQC(size) #;set datadesc= $$datadescsig()_datadesc set ..DDbin(i)=datadesc #endif } if zip64 { do ..mkLFH(.binlfh,version,flag,method,time,date,/*crc*/, maxsize, maxsize)} else { do ..mkLFH(.binlfh,version,flag,method,time,date,/*crc*/,/*zipsize*/, size) } #;B ; after make lfh do ..LFHsetFile(.binlfh,file) if zip64 { do ..LFHsetExtra(.binlfh,extraZip64) } set ..LFHbin(id)=binlfh use packfile:..lfhoffset W binlfh set rawoffset=..lfhoffset+..lfhFullLen(binlfh)-gzipminhdrlen use packfile:rawoffset use packfile:(/GZIP=1) try { close file } catch {} open file:("RUK\RAW\") set len=0 #;B ; zip for { use file read bin use packfile write bin set len=len+$L(bin) if len'<size quit } close file close packfile set offset=##class(%File).GetFileSize(packfile)-8 open packfile:("RWUK\RAW\") use packfile:(/GZIP=0) use packfile:offset #;B ; read gzip tailor read crc#4 read isize#4 set zipsize=offset-..lfhoffset-..lfhFullLen(binlfh) #;B ;zipsize is calculated do ..LFHsetCRC(.binlfh,crc) do ..LFHsetZipSize(.binlfh,zipsize) use packfile:..lfhoffset W binlfh set ..LFHbin(id)=binlfh set ..LFHo(id)=..lfhoffset set ..lfhoffset=offset #;B ; pack add file by id end if zip64 { set ..zip64=1 }

Method.name: unpack
unpackbyid
Method.Implementation:
set $ztrap="exit" set ..ZE="" set maxsize=4294967295 set zip64=0 set restorepack=0 set packfile=..packfile set lfhbin=..LFHbin(id) set filename=..files(id) set offset=..LFHo(id) close packfile open packfile:("RWUK\RAW\") use packfile do ..getLFH(..LFHbin(id),,.ver,.flag,.meth,.time,.date,.crc,.zipsize,.size,.fnlen,.extralen) #;B ; unpackbyid.getLFH if size=maxsize || (zipsize=maxsize ) { set zip64=1 } if zip64=1 { do ..LFHgetFileSizes(..LFHbin(id),.size,.zipsize) } set oraw=offset+$L(..LFHbin(id)) set gzipminhdr=..gzipminhdr() set gziphdrlen=$L(gzipminhdr) set ogziphdr=oraw-gziphdrlen
#;B ; gziphdr end
set ogziptlr=offset+..structlen(..lfhmeta())+fnlen+extralen+zipsize set gziptlr=..gziptlr(crc,size) set gziptlrlen=$L(gziptlr)
set restorepack=1
#; now put in file gziphdr use packfile:ogziphdr read savedgziphdr#gziphdrlen use packfile:ogziphdr write gzipminhdr
#; now put in file gziptlr use packfile:ogziptlr read savedgziptlr#gziptlrlen use packfile:ogziptlr write gziptlr close packfile
set targetfile=targetdir_filename #; check directory of file and create it if it is missed set dir=##class(%File).GetDirectory(targetfile) if '$D(..TargetSubDirs(dir)) { if '##class(%File).DirectoryExists(dir) { set ret=##class(%File).CreateDirectoryChain(dir) } set ..TargetSubDirs(dir)="" }
#;B ;copy open packfile:("RUK\RAW\") use packfile:ogziphdr use packfile:(/GZIP=1) open targetfile:("NWUK\RAW\") set len=0 set buflen=65536 #;B ;loop for { use packfile if len+buflen<size { read bin#buflen } else { read bin#(size-len)} set len=len+$L(bin) use targetfile write bin if len'<size quit } close packfile close targetfile
#; restore updates gzip header and tailer back exit if restorepack { open packfile:("WUK\RAW\") if $data(savedgziphdr) { use packfile:ogziphdr write savedgziphdr } if $data(savedgziptlr) { use packfile:ogziptlr write savedgziptlr } close packfile } quit error set $ztrap="" set ..ZE=$ZE goto exit

Method.name: getLFH
Method.Implementation: set magic=$E(bin,1,4) set version=$E(bin,5,6) set flag=$E(bin,7,8) set method=$E(bin,9,10) set time=$E(bin,11,12) set date=$E(bin,13,14) set crc=$E(bin,15,18) set zipsize=$ZLA($E(bin,19,22)) set size=$ZLA($E(bin,23,26)) set fnlen=$ZWA($E(bin,27,28)) set extralen=$ZWA($E(bin,29,30)) quit

Method.name: LFHgetLengths
Method.Implementation: set fnlen=$ZWA($E(bin,27,28)) set extralen=$ZWA($E(bin,29,30))

Method.name: lfhFullLen
Method.Implementation: do ..LFHgetLengths(.bin,.fnlen,.extralen) quit ..lfhlen+fnlen+extralen

Method.name: mkLFH
LFHsetFile
Method.Implementation: do ..getLFH(.bin,.fnlenold,.extralen) set lfhlen=..structlen(..lfhmeta()) set binhead=$E(bin,1,lfhlen) set fnold=$E(bin,lfhlen+1,lfhlen+fnlenold) set binextra=$E(bin,lfhlen+fnlenold+1,lfhlen+fnlenold+extralen) set $E(binhead,27,28)=$ZWC($L(file)) set bin=binhead_file_binextra

Method.name: LFHsetCRC
Method.Implementation: set $E(bin,15,18)=crc

Method.name: LFHsetZipSize
LFHgetFileSizes
Method.Implementation: set lfhlen=..lfhlen set zip64id=$C(1,0) set maxsize=$C(255,255,255,255) set fnlen=$ZWA(bin,27) set extrasize=$ZWA(bin,29) set size=$E(bin,19,22) set zipsize=$E(bin,23,26) if size'=maxsize || (zipsize'=maxsize) { set size=$ZLA(size) set zipsize=$ZLA(zipsize) quit } set extra=$E(bin,lfhlen+fnlen+1,lfhlen+fnlen+extrasize) set o=0 for { set extrahid=$E(extra,o+1,o+2) set extrahlen=$ZWA(extra,o+3) if extrahid=zip64id quit set o=o+4+extrahlen if o'< extrasize quit } if extrahid=zip64id { set size=$ZQA(extra,o+##expression(1+4)) set zipsize=$ZQA(extra,o+##expression(1+4+8)) } else { set size="" set zipsize="" }

Method.name: LFHsetExtra
Method.Implementation: set extralen=$L(extra) set lfhlen=30 do ..LFHgetLengths(.bin,.fnlen,.extrlenold) set $E(bin,29,30)=$ZWC(extralen) set bin=$E(bin,1,lfhlen+fnlen)_extra

Method.name: getLFSrawstream
Method.Implementation: set foffset=..LFHo(id) do ..getLFH(..LFHbin(id),,.ver,.flag,.meth,.time,.date,.crc,.zipsize,.size,.fnlen,.extralen) quit foffset+..structlen(..lfhmeta())+fnlen+extralen

Method.name: getCDH
Method.Implementation: set sig=$E(bin,1,4) set madever=$ZWA(bin,5) set extrver=$ZWA(bin,7) set flag=$E(bin,9,10) set meth=$E(bin,11,12) set ftime=$E(bin,13,14) set fdate=$E(bin,15,16) set crc=$E(bin,17,20) set zipsize=$ZLA($E(bin,21,24)) set size=$ZLA($E(bin,25,28)) set fnlen=$ZWA($E(bin,29,30)) set extralen=$ZWA($E(bin,31,32)) set fclen=$ZWA($E(bin,33,34)) set dns=$ZWA($E(bin,35,36)) set ifa=$E(bin,37,38) set efa=$E(bin,39,42) set rolh=$E(bin,43,46) quit

Method.name: mkCDRfromLFH
Method.Implementation: set maxsize=4294967295 set maxsizebin=$C(255,255,255,255) set lfhlen=..structlen(..lfhmeta()) set cdrlen=..structlen(..cdrmeta()) set cdrbin=$TR($J("",cdrlen)," ",$C(0)) set $E(cdrbin,1,4)=..cdrsig() set $E(cdrbin,5,6)=$E(lfhbin,5,6) set $E(cdrbin,7,8)=$E(lfhbin,5,6) #; flag set $E(cdrbin,9,10)=$E(lfhbin,7,8) #; method set $E(cdrbin,11,12)=$E(lfhbin,9,10) #; time set $E(cdrbin,13,14)=$E(lfhbin,11,12) #; date set $E(cdrbin,15,16)=$E(lfhbin,13,14) #; crc set $E(cdrbin,17,20)=$E(lfhbin,15,18) #; compressed size set zipsize=$E(lfhbin,19,22) set $E(cdrbin,21,24)=zipsize if zipsize=maxsizebin { set zip64=1 } else { set zip64=0 } #; uncompressed size set size=$E(lfhbin,23,26) if size=maxsizebin ||(zip64=1) { set zip64=1 } else { set zip64=0 } set $E(cdrbin,25,28)=$E(lfhbin,23,26) #; filename len set fnlen=$E(lfhbin,27,28) set $E(cdrbin,29,30)=fnlen set fnlen=$ZWA(fnlen) #; extra len set extralen=$E(lfhbin,29,30) set $E(cdrbin,31,32)=extralen set extralen=$ZWA(extralen) if lfho'="" { if lfho>maxsize { set zip64=1 } else { set $E(cdrbin,43,46)=$ZLC(lfho) } } #; fcomment if fcomment'="" { set $E(bin,33,34)=$ZWC($L(fcomment)) } if zip64 { set extra=$E(lfhbin,lfhlen+fnlen+1,lfhlen+fnlen+extralen) if extra="" { set extra=$C(1,0)_$C(16,0)_$ZQC(size)_$ZQC(zipsize) } set $E(cdrbin,21,24)=maxsizebin set $E(cdrbin,25,28)=maxsizebin set $E(cdrbin,43,46)=maxsizebin set extra=$E(extra,1,2)_$ZWC($ZWA(extra,3)+8)_$E(extra,##expression(4+1),##expression(4+16))_$ZQC(lfho) set cdrbin=cdrbin_$E(lfhbin,lfhlen+1,lfhlen+fnlen)_extra_fcomment set $E(cdrbin,31,32)=$ZWC($L(extra)) } else { set cdrbin=cdrbin_$E(lfhbin,lfhlen+1,lfhlen+fnlen)_$E(lfhbin,lfhlen+fnlen+1,lfhlen+fnlen+extralen)_fcomment }

Method.name: dumpCDR
Method.Implementation: do ..getCDH(bin, .sig, .madever, .extrver, .flag, .meth, .ftime, .fdate, .crc, .zipsize, .size, .fnlen, .extralen, .fclen, .dns, .ifa, .efa, .rolh) W "file comment length",fclen,! quit

Method.name: lfhsig
Method.Implementation: quit $zlc($zhex("04034b50"))

Method.name: cdrsig
Method.Implementation: quit $zlc($zhex("02014b50"))

Method.name: eocdrsig
Method.Description: end of current directory record signature
Method.Implementation: quit $zlc($zhex("06054b50"))

Method.name: zip64eocdrsig
Method.Description: zip64 end of current directory record signature
Method.Implementation: quit $zlc($zhex("06064b50"))

Method.name: zip64eocdlsig
Method.Description: zip64 end of current directory locator signature

Method.name: lfhlen
Method.Implementation: set LFHs=..lfhmeta() set n=$LL(LFHs) set len=0 for i=1:1:n set len=len+$LI($LI(LFHs,i),2) quit len

Method.name: structlen
Method.Description: calculate length of struct basing on metainfo
Method.Implementation: set n=$LL(meta) set len=0 for i=1:1:n { set len=len+$LI($LI(meta,i),2) } quit len

Method.name: lfhmeta
Method.Implementation: quit $LB( $LB("local file header signature",4), $LB("version needed to extract",2), $LB("general purpose bit flag",2), $LB("compression method",2), $LB("last mod file time",2), $LB("last mod file date",2), $LB("crc-32",4), $LB("compressed size",4), $LB("uncompressed size",4), $LB("file name length",2), $LB("extra field length",2) )

Method.name: cdrmeta
Method.Implementation: quit $LB( $LB("central file header signature",4), $LB("version madeby",2), $LB("version needed to extract",2), $LB("general purpose bit flag",2), $LB("compression method",2), $LB("last mod file time",2), $LB("last mod file date",2), $LB("crc-32",4), $LB("compressed size",4), $LB("uncompressed size",4), $LB("file name length",2), $LB("extra field length",2), $LB("file comment length",2), $LB("disk number start",2), $LB("internal file attributes",2), $LB("external file attributes",4), $LB("relative offset of local header",4) )

Method.name: eocdrmeta
Method.Implementation: quit $LB( $LB("end of central dir signature",4), $LB("number of this disk",2), $LB("number of the disk with the start of the central directory",2), $LB("total number of entries in the central directory on this disk",2), $LB("total number of entries in the central directory",2), $LB("size of the central directory",4), $LB("offset of start of central directory with respect to the starting disk number",4), $LB("zip file comment length",2) )

Method.name: eocdr64meta
Method.Implementation: quit $LB( $LB("end of central dir signature",4), $LB("size of zip64 end of central directory record",8), $LB("version made by",2), $LB("version needed to extract",2), $LB("number of this disk",4), $LB("number of the disk with the start of the central directory",4), $LB("total number of entries in the central directory on this disk",8), $LB("total number of entries in the central directory",8), $LB("size of the central directory",8), $LB("offset of start of central directory with respect to the starting disk number",8) )

Method.name: eocdl64meta
Method.Implementation: quit $LB( $LB("zip64 end of central dir locator signature",4), $LB("number of the disk with the start of the zip64 end of central directory",4), $LB("relative offset of the zip64 end of central directory record",8), $LB("total number of disks",4) )

Method.name: getEOCDR
Method.Implementation: set sig=$E(bin,1,4) set zipcommentlen=$zwa(bin,20)

Method.name: mkEOCDR
Method.Description: create end of common directory record

Method.name: mkEOCDR64
mkEOCDL64
Method.Implementation: set len=..structlen(..eocdl64meta()) set bin=$TR($J("",len)," ",$C(0)) set $E(bin,1,4)=..zip64eocdlsig() set $E(bin,##expression(8+1),##expression(8+8))=$ZQC(oeocdr) set $E(bin,##expression(8+8+1),##expression(8+8+4))=$ZLC(disknum)

Method.name: BuildFileIndex
Method.Implementation: kill ..idxlfhfiles set i="" for { set i=$order(..files(i),1,file) quit:i="" set ..idxlfhfiles(file)=i } kill ..idxcdrfiles set i="" for { set i=$order(..cdrfiles(i),1,file) quit:i="" set ..idxcdrfiles(file)=i }

Method.name: gziptlr
Method.Description: crc is 4 binary bytes size uncompressed length
Method.Implementation: quit crc_$zlc(isize)

Method.name: dosDateTimeBinToString

Method.name: dosTSYMDHMStoBin

Method.name: dosDateYMDtoBin
Method.Implementation: quit $ZWC(year-1980*512+(month*32)+day)

Method.name: dosTimeHMStoBin
Method.Implementation: quit $ZWC(hour*2048+(minute*32)+(second/2))

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation: set ..lfhlen=..lfhlen() set ..gzipminhdrlen=$L(..gzipminhdr()) quit $$$OK
